places.name: El Salam Entertainment Center
places.address: Mustafa Kamel WA Bolkli, Sidi Gaber, Alexandria Governorate

comments.comment: Excellent place for toddlers. With Avery affordable price. Only lacks the air conditioning rendering it bad for parents.
The place is really wonderful and it has all the tools of entertainment but I would recommend to have a drink there
Amazing and unique place suitable for kids and Adults.

places.desc: This Place offers a chance to the most amazing entertainments. this is the place to celebrate! So gather with all the family or friends who make you the happiest and come to have the best experience of fun ever

places.name: Carrefour City Center
places.address: Gate 4 - 1st Alexandria Cairo Desert Road - Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate 11432

comments.comment: I love this place very much because I can buy what I need easily there. Everything, clothes,food, shoes... etc And I can eat from different restaurants and sit on a Cafe. There is a wonderful cinema and a funfair for kids.

really good time for shopping and have a good time there.  alot of places to visit coffee is good alot of brands and market is amazing too . really enjoyable  time and place I recommended for all people

places.desc: This Place offers a chance to the most amazing entertainments. this is the place to celebrate! So gather with all the family or friends who make you the happiest and come to have the best experience of fun ever

places.name: San Stefano Grand Plaza
places.address: El-Gaish Rd, San Stifano, Qism El-Raml, Alexandria Governorate

comments.comment: It is one of the places where you can enjoy drinking your cup of coffee ☕ without being bothered by anyone.. It has many shops and restaurants for shopping. I personally like going there each now and then.

I like this place but the only problem is the sitting in the food court once you buy the food you can’t sit and enjoy your food it needed to be bigger than that more seats and tables the cinema up there is cool it’s clean and nice a bit high “price-wise” but it’s fine for me

places.desc: This Place offers a chance to the most amazing entertainments. this is the place to celebrate! So gather with all the family or friends who make you the happiest and come to have the best experience of fun ever

places.name: Egypt Skate Club
places.address: El-Gaish Rd, San Stifano, Qism El-Raml, Alexandria Governorate

comments.comment: Perfect for beginners, the staff are good at what they do, fairly priced. I recommend 2 hours, and the ski pack for the adults,whole package for children.
